content.description: Start sitting on the stone that rests under the shield.Use a flat deep jug for your right hand and a moderate side pull hidden under the roof for your left hand. Climb up the shield using all the holds on the face to help you access the crack feature which forms the right side of the shield. Enjoy!
content.location: This line climbs the obvious shield feature on the left for which the boulder gets it's name.

content.description: Sit Start on the two low flat jugs and a high left foot. Slap up the cube feature and top out easily.

Sit start as for ratchet strapped, once you get the pocket transition onto the shield feature using crimps and a sidepull. Do a dance and figure out how to gain the jug/Gaston up left then top straight out. The jug in the crack for ratchet was not used and should be considered off although may not take away from the final moves difficulty.

A nice bloc because it sits away from the main sector and has not been vandalized with graffiti. This boulder features "Ratchet Strapped", a quality line that climbs the shield feature for which the boulder gets it's name. Also featured on this bloc are several nice warm-ups to the right of this line to  help you find your flow.
